c74object.name: cui.log.commenter
c74object.digest: Allows operator or observer to add comments directly to the log.
c74object.description: Use cui.log.commenter to send comments to the log.

outlet.description: pass out the most recent log message as it gets written to the file

method.name: write
method.digest: write the log to a file
method.description: write the log to a file

method.name: open
method.digest: show log file in a window
method.description: show log file in a window

method.name: clear
method.digest: clear all entries in the log file
method.description: clear all entries in the log file

c74object.discussion:
This document refers to the viddll engine version of jit.movie.
The viddll backed jit.movie relies heavily on the cache_size attribute for performance, especially when playing in reverse.
